ao.description: Implementation of a digital solution: it enables the management of the B2B/B2C sales process, it connects the different stakeholders in this process: sales representatives, customers (partners and direct customers) and consultants.

todo.job: As Full Stack CTO, I was responsible for the technical architecture of the project, ensuring its performance, security and ability to adapt to market trends.
todo.project: All-in-one marketplace solution in 3 language versions.

tasks.t1: Analysis and specification of requirements through a use case diagram.
tasks.t2: Design and preparation of technical and functional documents (class diagram).
tasks.t3: Development of various REST APIs Back end and Consumption of REST APIs front end.
tasks.t4: Implementation and development of various functionalities.
tasks.t5: Notification of the various stakeholders in the process (sockets, push, mailing).
tasks.t6: Statistics and reporting using the APEX CHART library.
tasks.t7: Writing and maintaining automation tests using JUnit.
tasks.t8: Extraction and transformation of data from various sources (XML, JSON, text) and presentation of results on web pages or export to PDF/Excel format.

bacola.description: As an example of implementing an e-commerce application, we will examine version 16 of Angular.

todo.job: Complete front-end development of an e-commerce solution leveraging new features of Angular 16 such as directive composition, functional guards, signals, etc.

tasks.t1: The project uses the NgModule architecture (standalone: false) and produces an interface based on a premium WordPress theme.
tasks.t2: Using NgModule with an MVVM architecture.
tasks.t3: Reactive state management with NgRx for currency and location.
tasks.t5: Using the NgZorroAnt library to style the components.

cm2.description: Managing a business, association, or store isn't easy without the right tools, and Comture.MSO 2 can help. This business management and accounting software lets you manage your suppliers, customers, inventory, and much more.

todo.job: Design, development and marketing of a multi-user desktop application for business management, specially designed for self-employed individuals or micro-enterprises, whether or not subject to VAT.
todo.project: Billing system for self-employed individuals and TPE/PME.

tasks.t1: Customer management, purchasing, quotes and invoices.
tasks.t2: Calculation of social security and tax contributions for a micro-enterprise, or assistance with VAT returns, depending on the type of company.
tasks.t4: Simplified automatic accounting (purchase register and sales book).

gostore.description: This is an e-commerce application built with Angular 17, NodeJS and MySQL.

todo.job: Full-stack development of an e-commerce application: we examine the new features of Angular 17 such as signal inputs, deferred model loading with Defer, control flows and view transitions.

tasks.t1: Angular novelty inspection: Standalone, Signal, Defer, Control Flow, etc.
tasks.t2: Selective strategy based on route data (preloading of popular categories).
tasks.t3: Using the NgRx state management library.
tasks.t4: Styling components with the NgZorroAnt library.

migros.description: The transformation project at Migros, Turkey's largest retail supermarket chain, aims to rethink all internal tools using cutting-edge technologies, establish CI/CD quality assurance practices, and train all departments on the improved infrastructure.

todo.job: I work as a front-end architect in this transformation process with a team consisting of 2 back-end developers (Java Spring), 1 DevOps engineer (Azure DevOps), 1 QA engineer, 1 other front-end developer and 1 UI/UX designer.
todo.project: E-commerce website for Migros stores in T√ºrkiye.

tasks.t1: Participate in all decision-making processes which include database design, tooling, deployment processes, etc.
tasks.t2: Use the monorepo model because it offers advantages in reusability and dependency management using the Nrwl Nx monorepo tool.
tasks.t3: Transform all existing applications one by one, and transfer the project to the designated teams.
tasks.t4: Writing tests with Jest and Cypress.
tasks.t5: Implementation of CI/CD processes on Azure DevOps with the DevOps engineer.

polaris.description: Polaris is a workers' compensation claims management system based on insurance logic, developed using Java for the back end and SQL for the database. This portal allows for the evaluation, coding, creation, and approval of policies.

todo.job: Work as a backend developer within a team consisting of a fullstack architect, a QA tester, a frontend developer and a backend developer.
todo.project: Insurance portal for Polaris Motorcycle owners, intended for professionals and individuals.

tasks.t2: Extracting active forms from the database and generated reports.
tasks.t3: Generation of the property reference report, the related policy report, the related producer report and the producer contact report.
tasks.t4: Working within the Policy Quote screen includes pricing, fees, commission, pre-binding, payment plan, and complete binding logic.
tasks.t5: Working on policy endorsements for coverage.

orup.description: Showcase website to present an insurance and financial services brokerage company in Drancy - Paris.

todo.job: Custom website development and design. Content research, collection, and adaptation. Implementation and monitoring of the solution. Search engine optimization (SEO).
todo.project: A custom-designed, high-performing, fast, and search engine optimized showcase website.

parags.p1: An aesthetically pleasing website adapted to the target audience, the company's activities and constraints.
parags.p2: Implementation of graphic mock-ups created according to a mobile-focused strategy.
parags.p3: Implementation of SEO strategies to improve the site's visibility in search engines.

rinitec.description: Technical website of an IT service provider for businesses - Sidi Bel Abb√®s.

todo.job: Needs analysis and drafting of specifications. Drafting of functional specifications and technical choices. Ongoing support during development and employee training.
todo.project: High-quality technical website, high-performance design, flexible and secure solution, optimized for search engines.

parags.p1: An audit that assesses the actual needs of the activity as well as its technical and financial resources.
parags.p2: Designs, develops and implements the solution, from the study phase to its integration.
parags.p3: Monitoring management ensures that the solution evolves in line with technical advances and business needs.

switcher.description: E-commerce website created with Shopify Winter Edition 24. This project was developed for a leading textile company in Switzerland.
switcher.todo: In collaboration with a full-stack developer, I participated in the creation and optimization of the store on the Shopify platform. I was responsible for deployment, customization, and maintenance via the Shopify CMS and APIs.

fmao.description: Promotional videos that allow you to market, advertise and promote an online sales platform in order to capture attention and encourage action.

fmrinitec.description: Promotional videos to showcase an IT services agency to businesses.

asvg.description: SVG animations allow you to create dynamic and engaging graphics within the Macromiss software interface. These animations modify the properties of SVG shapes over time. The example illustrates the animations used in authentication management.
asvg.help: üí°Click on the image to reanimate the SVG!
